Description: I've owned this guitar for 15 years and it has never been out of the house, very hard to find a classic with this type of top, but it's time to thin the herd, this is a True beauty, the guitar is stunning, with a very 3-D wavy top. Resonant! Neck is ultra comfortable profile. This guitar has never been out of the house, smoke free barely played, only in the living room. Exceptional condition! A couple of marks from sitting on the stand, might be able to be buffed out, see photos. Exceptional clean 1995 Gibson Les Paul 1960 Classic Premium Plus in 100% original and excellent condition. The guitar is lightly played and and comes from the 2nd owner with the original pickguard has never been installed. This model is a Premium Plus model which has a absolute stunning 3D top with flames all over the top, visible from all angles! The slim- tapered 60s neck, which makes this instrument eal comfortable to play. Comes in its orig. Gibson hardshell case with pickguard.Techn. Daten:Solid 1-piece mahagony bodyBookmatched, highly flamed AAAAA maple top1-piece mahagony neckSlim tappered ´60s neck profileInked serial numberVintage tulip tuners (Singlering)Golden top-hat knobs2x humbucking PUs (496/500)Nickel hardwareAdjust. Tune-O-Matic bridgeIncl. Gibson hardshell case From Gibson: A classic example of the ever elusive classic this incredibly clean of an original 1960 Les Paul Standard one of the more pristine Bursts , it remains a well cared-for and exceptional guitar, very little wear, and a top that exemplifies the word "flame": deep, moving, pronounced and consistent from side-to-side, playable feel that eases into your hand. For tone, its slightly off-balance pickups exhibit a unique mid-tone that's dark and sweet, while the highs cut through for clarity and the lows maintain that classic "woman tone" that barks beautifully with aggressive string attack and purrs when you back off. Shipping to continental USA only! United States bidders only!
